page.title: 13BLAKE MATERNITY HOME
page.content: This maternity home provides facilities for all maternity patients in Gosport. It is staffed by a Nursing Officer, four sisters, five midwives and eleven auxiliary nurses. It has facilities for three patients in labour and fifteen post natal patients. In addition to the permanent staff there are twelve community midwives attached to local General Practitioners who use the hospital facilities to deliver their own patients. The majority of patients spend seven days in the home. Approximately 220 babies are delivered each year, in addition to those delivered in St Mary's Hospital in Portsmouth. Mothers and babies delivered generally return to Blake for a recovery period. The outpatient clinics deal with about 1100 patients annually.
